pages.text: $(li)The Blackboard is a block that allows to you to make custom pixel art draws using Black and White colors.$(br)$(li)Like $(l:patchouli:decoration/alexsmobs/banner_patterns)Banners$(/l) you can join a Blackboard with a pattern and get a copy of this pattern.

$(li)You can clean the Blackboard right clicking a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/cauldron)Cauldron$(/l) with water in its interior while you are holding the Blackboard that you want to clean in your hand.
